summary: Vinegar is a sour liquid made from fermenting sugar into alcohol and then turning it into acetic acid. It's used a lot in cooking to add flavor and to pickle foods. You might have heard of balsamic or malt vinegar. These are popular types. Vinegar is also useful around the house as a cleaner because it's a mild acid. It can be made from different things, which gives us many kinds of vinegar, each with a unique taste.
title: Vinegar
